articles.author: Gillian Rutherford
articles.title: Gut bacteria key to fighting colorectal cancer, study suggests - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Metabolites produced by gut bacteria during digestion can be used to trigger an immune response against colorectal cancer cells, according to new University of Alberta research, published in Frontiers in Immunology, that points toward a potential treatment fo…
